channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Rare October storm brings heavy rain and threat of mudslides to Southern California
item.description: Southern California is getting hit by a rare October storm that’s pummeling the region with heavy rain and heavy winds. Mudslides are possible Tuesday.

item.title: An eighth body was found at a Georgia highway crash between a semitrailer and van, official says
Pennsylvania man pleads guilty in arson attack at governor’s mansion while Shapiro’s family slept
